name: who-is-this-pokemon
description: A page to collect pokemons. The more you can recognize them the more you can get them

scripts.clear: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp index.html build && cp -a assets build && touch build/bundle.js build/index.css
scripts.start:js-live: npm run clear && npm run compile-sass && webpack-dev-server --mode development
scripts.start:css-live: npm run clear && webpack --mode development && npm run compile-sass && npm run compile-sass:w & npm run live-server
scripts.build: npm run clear && node-sass app/scss/index.scss build/index.css --output-style=compressed && webpack --mode production

author: Fernando Oliveira
